name: Paige Niedringhaus
bio: Paige is a full-stack Senior Software Engineer, currently working in Atlanta, GA at The Home Depot in the Merchandising IT department. A former digital marketer, she holds a Bachelor’s in Business Administration from Emory University’s Goizueta Business School and later learned to program at coding bootcamp DigitalCrafts. When she’s not coding in JavaScript (and her current favorite framework, React), speaking at tech conferences or blogging about programming, you can find her hanging out with her husband and making art.
